name: nozes
description: Declarative tool to create plain javascript components

scripts.build-module: npx rollup nozes.mjs | npx uglify-js -cm > dist/nozes.min.mjs
scripts.build: npm run build-standalone && npm run build-module
scripts.build-from-typescript: npx tsc --outFile /dev/stdout nozes.ts | npx uglify-js -cm > dist/nozes.min.js

author: Henrique Gog√≥ <henriquegogo@gmail.com> (https://henriquegogo.github.io)
